1.0.name: wordpress/melascrivi
1.0.description: This plugin include in the Wordpress Dashboard all the services of Melascrivi.com and Hotype.co.uk. Every WP blog owner will be able to ask, review, accept and then publish unique contents on his website. Simple and strongly recommended for SEO needs.
